Step 1: Download and Install the App
Visit the Google Play Store or Apple App Store on your smartphone..
Search for the 'Food Delivery Agent App' and click on the app.
Tap on the 'Install' button to download and install the app on your device..

Step 2: Login or Create an Account
Launch the app after installation.
If you already have an account, enter your login credentials (username and password) and click on the 'Login' button.
If you're a new user, click on the 'Create Account' or 'Sign Up' button and follow the on-screen instructions to create a new account.

Step 3: Complete Profile Setup
After logging in or creating an account, you may be prompted to complete your profile setup.
Provide the required information, such as your name, contact details, and delivery vehicle details (if applicable).
Save your profile settings.

Step 4: Accepting Delivery Requests.
On the app's main screen, you will see a list of available delivery requests or orders..
Tap on a request to view the details, including the customer's address, order items, and delivery instructions.
Review the details and tap on the 'Accept' button if you're available to fulfill the order..

Step 5: Navigating to the Customer's Location.
Once you accept a delivery request, the app may provide you with an option to navigate to the customer's location..
Tap on the 'Navigate' or 'Get Directions' button to launch your preferred navigation app (such as Google Maps) and get turn-by-turn directions to the customer's address..

Step 6: Pickup and Delivery.
.
Arrive at the customer's location and locate their exact address..
Contact the customer if necessary, using the provided contact details, to coordinate the pickup or delivery process..
Verify the order details with the customer and confirm any special instructions..
Collect the order from the restaurant or pickup location, ensuring that it matches the customer's order details..
Safely transport the order to the customer's delivery address..
